Odd칩 B, David
metadata.dc:description: Actinomycotic infections of the heart is an uncommon disease, especially if the infection affects the valvular endocardium as primary focus. Just a few cases have been reported previously. We report a case of primary endocarditis of the mitral valve caused by Actinomyces sp diagnosed at necropsy in a 34 year-old man with history of chronic rheumatic disease presenting as a usual case of infective endocarditis.
metadata.dc:title: Endocarditis infecciosa actinomic칩tica de la v치lvula mitral. Caso de autopsia y revisi칩n de la literatura.
[Actinomycotic infective endocarditis of the mitral valve. Anatomoclinical case and review of literature].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista chilena de infectologia : organo oficial de la Sociedad Chilena de Infectologia
